summary.span: 描述 物件的大寫字母樣式。

span.span: Describes the capital letter style for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大寫字是一組以大寫樣式字符轉譯文字的印刷格式。Capitals are a set of typographical forms that render text in capital-styled glyphs. 一般而言，當文字全部轉譯為大寫時，字母之間的間距可能太近，字母的加權和比例會過重。Typically, when text is rendered as all capitals, the spacing between letters can appear too tight, and the weight and proportion of the letters too heavy. OpenType 大寫，包括小型大寫字、 特小大寫字、 標題，和大寫字母間距支援樣式設定格式的數的字。OpenType supports a number of styling formats for capitals, including small capitals, petite capitals, titling, and capital spacing. 這些樣式格式可讓您控制大寫字的外觀。These styling formats allow you to control the appearance of capitals. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的標準大寫字母，後面接著樣式設定為 "SmallCaps" 和 "AllSmallCaps" 的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 在此情況下，三個單字全都使用相同的字型大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大寫的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大寫的文字")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 大寫字母的範例Example of capitals 標題大寫字的加權和比例較輕，設計目的是為了比正常大寫字母看起來更雅緻。Titling capitals are lighter in weight and proportion and designed to give a more elegant look than normal capitals. 標題大寫字通常用於較大的字型大小作為標題。Titling capitals are typically used in larger font sizes as headings. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的正常和標題大寫字。The following text displays normal and titling capitals for the Pescadero font. 請注意第二行文字較窄的主體寬度。Notice the narrower stem widths of the text on the second line. ![使用 OpenType 標題用大寫的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont20.gif "使用 OpenType 標題用大寫的文字")![Text using OpenType titling capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont20.gif "Text using OpenType titling capitals") 一般和加標題大寫字母的範例Example of normal and titling capitals > [!NOTE] > 大部分的 OpenType 字型公開可用的總 OpenType 功能的子集。Most OpenType fonts expose only a subset of the total OpenType features available. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義使用的屬性 Pescadero 字型大寫字物件。The following code example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using properties of the object. 使用 "SmallCaps" 格式時會略過任何開頭的大寫字母。When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#9)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義使用的屬性 Pescadero 字型加標題大寫字物件。The following code example shows how to define titling capitals for the Pescadero font, using properties of the object. Unicase 字型會以透過型別設計工具決定之大寫字母和小寫字母圖像的混合來呈現大寫字母和小寫字母。

span.span: Unicase fonts render both upper and lowercase letters in a mixture of upper and lowercase glyphs determined by the type designer.
